attributes.action: Vote to give President Trump dual nationality. USA/UK.
attributes.background: President Trump has a Scottish Mother. This means he is allegeable for dual nationality.  After he has served 8 years making America great again, he can move to Britain, win an election and put the "Great" back into Great Britain. Britain needs a breath of fresh air  propelled into British politics.

rejection.details: It would be up to President Trump himself to apply for UK nationality, if he wished to do so.
